Text.Page:
Those fangspawn abominations are murderous. They've killed too many troops to let live.

Take out the {@LinkCreature:4#2011#voracious fangspawns} and don't be gentle.

Report to Helone at Firebase Intrepid when your mission is complete.

Excellent! You really showed those aberrations who's in charge!

Take this with our thanks!
I know that this job isn't simple, but I can't reward you for just walking over here. You'll have to do a bit more, I'm afraid.
